A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I watched this after reading terrible reviews\, and people calling it the worst Star Wars movie ever. Well\, to my surprise\, I really enjoyed it. I like the interaction between Rey and Kylo Ren\, and how they portrayed Luke Skywalker\, beyond the cliché \"superhero\"\, Jesus\, Messiah\, perfect creature. It was a cool new take that of course\, it was going to piss off those who want the same stories over and over again.
